sentences.english: Come on. Say it, you ninny .
Being alone is much better than with a prick who studies excrement.
sentences.chinese: 單身總比和研究排泄物的笨蛋在一起好吧。

sentences.english: Just because I disagree with you, you don't have to call me a bonehead.
sentences.chinese: 就算我不同意你，你也沒必要叫我笨蛋啊。

sentences.english: My therapist believes I am certifiably nuts.
sentences.chinese: 我的醫生認爲，我是個不折不扣的笨蛋。

sentences.english: You're no better, you stupid S. O. B.
sentences.chinese: 你也好不到哪裏去，你這狗孃養的笨蛋。

sentences.english: Paula is a bonehead; she can't do anything right.
sentences.chinese: 寶拉是個笨蛋，她什麼事都做不對。

sentences.english: He looked like he was some slob having a beer at a baseball game. Embarrassing.
sentences.chinese: 看起來就像個棒球賽裏灌着啤酒邋邋遢遢的笨蛋。

sentences.english: If you make a single mistake, he will pounce on you and say you're a fool.
sentences.chinese: 你要是出一點差錯，他就會抓住機會說你是笨蛋。

sentences.english: You cannot improve a dull booby into a man of sense.
sentences.chinese: 你不能把傻頭傻腦的笨蛋改造成通情達理的人。

sentences.english: White in a sudden the Shan go to six Shis thousand beside, Doudoune Moncler, little idiot turn enter bosom in, intense sentiment a kiss.
sentences.chinese: 白瞬閃至陸蒔千身邊，將小笨蛋圈進懷中，激情一吻。

sentences.english: Try the book Juggling for the Complete Klutz.
sentences.chinese: 不妨看看《笨蛋如何玩雜耍》這本書。

sentences.english: They turned basketball's smartest crunch-time team into dummies.
sentences.chinese: 他們讓籃球場上關鍵時刻最聰明的球隊變成了笨蛋。

sentences.english: I never called you Manuel, idiot.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒叫過你曼紐爾，笨蛋。

sentences.english: He is like a fool which he can't boil an egg.
sentences.chinese: 他是那樣一個笨蛋，以致於連雞蛋都不會煮。

sentences.english: And you became a hero, and I became a schmuck .
sentences.chinese: 這樣你就成了英雄，而我成了一個笨蛋。

sentences.english: A pipe gives a wise man time to think and a fool something to stick in.
sentences.chinese: 煙管給聰明人靈感，給笨蛋口裏一個棍子。
